package:
ethercat_device_configurator 0.6.0 Core C++ library to interface one or multiple drives. Contains abstract base classes for the communication interface.
Proprietary Lennart Nachtigall Lennart Nachtigall
catkin
Optional dependencies. Any single drive sdk or any combination of sdks may be used. <--> anydrive elmo_ethercat_sdk maxon_epos_ethercat_sdk rokubi_rsl_ethercat_sdk
